tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AirQualityData (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_location VARCHAR(255),
    pollution_level FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE air_quality_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  sampled_at TIMESTAMP,
  pollution_level FLOAT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE air_quality_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    pm_2_5_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    pm_10_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public_health_data (
    health_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    health_condition VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    public_health_advisory VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES air_quality_data(data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cities (
    city_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(255),
    population INT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE health_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_id INT,
    reading_id INT,
    health_condition VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES cities(city_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reading_id) REFERENCES readings(reading_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  measurement_type VARCHAR,
  measurement_value FLOAT,
  measurement_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE air_quality_report (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city_id INT,
  pollution_level FLOAT,
  health_condition VARCHAR,
  report_time TIMESTAMP
);
